values: The Reason the Son of God Appeared Was to Destroy the Works of the DevilThe Reason the Son of God Appeared Was to Destroy the Works of the Devil

If any human is to be saved from their sin and from the righteous wrath of God, the Son of God had to become human for our regeneration.If any human is to be saved from their sin and from the righteous wrath of God, the Son of God had to become human for our regeneration.
